column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Been waiting for this place to open up for awhile and it most definitely exceeded my expectations. I could see this place being my go-to spot for southern comfort food and a good whiskey. If I could have my drink of choice
column2: whiskey would be it and this place does it right. 300 whiskeys available to try and their cocktails taste phenomenal. Don't like whiskey? That's okay
column3: they serve beer and other liquor as well.
